title: 2021 Niner JET 9 RDO gets longer, lower, slacker with adjustable geo & stiffer frame
content:
Building on a long history of short travel efficiency that’s gradually inched from lightweight XC to full-blown trail bike, the Niner JET 9 RDO has become their most popular bike. Now, they’ve made it even better. The new-for-2021 JET 9 RDO borrows the adjustable geometry flip chip from the longer travel RIP and WFO models, […]

The post 2021 Niner JET 9 RDO gets longer, lower, slacker with adjustable geo & stiffer frame appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
